item.title: Hosting a Hands-on Session: Lessons Learned
item.description: Every year, I wish to run a couple of public speaking sessions/presentations/demos. This year, I had the opportunity to teach a hands-on session at CAMUG and wanted to share some lessons learned with my readers on this blog. Thanks Terence for taking this photo.
